Although it doesn't star Angel Coulby, the cast includes renowned actors such as Sean Connery, Kevin Costner, and Robert De Niro. Another option that might catch your interest is 'Sin City' (2005), a neo-noir anthology film directed by Robert Rodriguez and Frank Miller, featuring an ensemble cast including Mickey Rourke, Jessica Alba, and Bruce Willis. This film features intricate storylines and vivid visuals that could appeal to your taste.
